channel.title: Need help quick please, loading maps (null)
channel.description: This is the error: [code] java.io.FileNotFoundException: nullMaps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:104) at client.startUp(client.java:8907) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6114) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at java.io.File.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.<init>(Update.java:25) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4836) at client.startUp(client.java:8919) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6114) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] seems like a kinda common error just wondering if anyone knows how to fix.

item.title: Need help quick please, loading maps (null)
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:6, topic:432828”]public Update(String s, String s1, String s2)
{
homeDir = s2;
saveAs = (new StringBuilder()).append(s2).append(s1).toString();
urlLoc = s;
if(!(new File(s2)).exists())
(new File(s2)).mkdir();
if(downloadFile())
{
unZipFile();
deleteFile();
} else
{
System.out.println(“error”);
deleteFile();
}
}[/quote]

What a load of crap. Please don’t tell me that you made that yourself.

There’s a problem in string s2 I believe: nullMaps\mapConfig.txt. Make sure the arguments are done properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help quick please, loading maps (null)
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

public Update(String s, String s1, String s2)
{
homeDir = s2;
saveAs = (new StringBuilder()).append(s2).append(s1).toString();
urlLoc = s;
if(!(new File(s2)).exists())
(new File(s2)).mkdir();
if(downloadFile())
{
unZipFile();
deleteFile();
} else
{
System.out.println(“error”);
deleteFile();
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need help quick please, loading maps (null)
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

This is the error:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: nullMaps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find th
e path specified)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at client.setNewMaps(client.java:104)
        at client.startUp(client.java:8907)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
        at client.run(client.java:6114)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at java.io.File.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at Update.<init>(Update.java:25)
        at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4836)
        at client.startUp(client.java:8919)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
        at client.run(client.java:6114)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

seems like a kinda common error just wondering if anyone knows how to fix.
